about_the_game:
★ MARTIN MY LOVE ★
Play with Martin alongside from the start + pick a duo of great items!
Enemies are stronger! +5% Attack +5% Magic Attack!

Stronger together!


This DLC lets you have Martin join from the start, as the 13th party member.
Enemies are also a little bit stronger: 105% ATK 105% MAT

In addition, you will get the chance to pick 1 out of these 4 deals:
  • Fanfan's Brush + Holy Ring
  • Rift Ring + Evil Ring
  • Zephyr Helmet + War Ring
  • Heroic Shield + Book of Dominion
